bullets.text: Second weak US jobs report (+22k) boosts odds of a 50 bp Fed cut; 10-year yield tumbles; mortgage rates see biggest one-day drop.
Immigration crackdown, including factory raids, constrains labor supply and production, increasingly cited as a driver of slower job and wage growth.
OPEC+ meets amid fragile demand and compliance risks; any supply shift could swing crude prices and near-term inflation expectations.
Treasuries' safe-haven status erodes as volatility and deficits lift risk premia, implying higher long-run borrowing costs for taxpayers despite cyclical yield dips.
Robinhood and AppLovin join the S&P 500, likely triggering index inflows and increased liquidity for both stocks.
Mega-cap tech extends rally to $21T combined market cap, helped by Google's antitrust 'resolution' and AI-driven earnings momentum.
Broadcom jumps on a $10B custom-silicon order, widely assumed from OpenAI, underscoring sustained AI infrastructure capex.
Anthropic to pay $1.5B to settle authors’ copyright suit, signaling rising AI training content costs and legal standard-setting for data licensing.
EU fines Google €2.95B for ad tech abuses, tightening oversight of platform dominance and potentially reshaping digital advertising markets.
Senate draft would rein in stock tokenization, signaling stricter guardrails between securities law and crypto rails.
White House signals 'substantial' chip tariffs while carving exceptions for major OEMs, complicating semiconductor supply chains and China trade tensions.
Brazil braces for possible U.S. sanctions linked to Bolsonaro trial, raising risks for trade, capital flows, and the real.
U.S. industrial space demand falls for first time in 15 years, signaling logistics slowdown and post-pandemic normalization.
Oceans could hit a tipping point by 2050, threatening fisheries, carbon sinks, and extreme-weather buffering without rapid emissions cuts.
Transparent solar-window tech advances promise building-integrated generation, potentially decarbonizing urban electricity without sacrificing daylighting.
